add_news_description: Please enter the title, content, and image of the news.
success_to_add_news: New news has been successfully added.
edit_news_description: Please change the title, content, and image of the news.
delete_news_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this news?
publish_news_description: Published news will be visible to all users.
publish_news_confirmation: Are you sure you want to publish this news?
unpublish_news_description: Unpublished news will not be visible to users.
unpublish_news_confirmation: Are you sure you want to unpublish this news?
archive_news_description: Archived news will not be visible to users.
archive_news_confirmation: Are you sure you want to archive this news?
unarchive_news_description: Unarchived news will be visible to users.
unarchive_news_confirmation: Are you sure you want to unarchive this news?
